landing.title: Custom Manufacturing,
landing.subtitle: Upload your CAD files, get instant quotes, and track your orders from production to delivery. Professional manufacturing services for CNC, 3D printing, laser cutting, and more.

cncMachining.title: CNC Machining
cncMachining.description: Precision CNC milling and turning for complex metal and plastic parts with tight tolerances.

laserCutting.title: Laser Cutting
laserCutting.description: High-speed laser cutting for sheet metal and flat parts with excellent edge quality.

printing3d.title: 3D Printing
printing3d.description: Rapid prototyping and production using FDM, SLA, and SLS technologies.

sheetMetal.title: Sheet Metal Forming
sheetMetal.description: Bending, stamping, and forming services for sheet metal components.

injectionMolding.title: Injection Molding
injectionMolding.description: High-volume plastic part production with custom molds and tooling.

weldedFab.title: Welded Fabrication
weldedFab.description: Custom welding and metal fabrication for structural and assembly work.
